snippet: The Upshot reported on a surprising study finding that white suspects are more likely to be shot by the police than black ones are. Well, maybe, many readers protested, but. . ....
abstract: The Upshot reported on a surprising study finding that white suspects are more likely to be shot by the police than black ones are. Well, maybe, many readers protested, but. . .

headline.main: Did a Hot-Button Upshot Story Lose Sight of the Readers?
